name: The Summer House
description:
Life may not be going the way we want and we might like to runaway to our memories from the past where everything was perfect and better than today, but is it? or has it been corrupted by your nostalgia?

Come back to your parent's old summer house and find out!

This is a short narrative game where you inspect the old house where you used to vacation with your family. The house seems to be empty, there is only you and the old memories of a past that only lives in your memory.

Welcome back, everything is just as you remember it.

Controls

A / Left ArrowMove LeftD / Right ArrowMove RightFInteract

Made by NekiNya and GalaxyTurtle.

Made for the FAU JAM #1, The theme was Nostalgia.

*Yes, the loading screen takes time.
